inn1.comm: What a start. Short. wide. Fierce cut. The ball crashed into point boundary. Why do you bowl there?
and lands on the pads, tucked behind square leg
good delivery cutting in from the middle, Sanga didn't expect it to shape in, tries to stab it and is struck high on the pad. There might have been some inside edge as well
swings down leg side, wide
fuller, on the off stump line, drawing sangakkara forward who squeezes it out of the outer edge to third man
he is trying hard not to give Sanath any room outside off, tried to bring this one back in to the left-hander but ended up slipping it down leg and Rahim makes a half stop
pushes this one across Sangakkara who lets it go past him
beaten outside off stump. In the zone, shaping away, Sangakkara pushes at it but inside the line and doesn't get the edge
grunts at release, serves a real full delivery on the off and middle, jabbed down the track
on the middle, full in length, Sanga turns it to the on side
well outside the off stump, left alone
pushes it across Sanath who comes forward and decides to leave it alone
in the channel again, left alone again.
short in length, on the middle, turned to square leg. End of the tight over
drifts to the pads, clipped to deep backward square leg . Easy pickings.
gets forward to defend a length delivery on the off stump
on the middle and leg, worked to square leg
moves forward to defend to covers
just outside the off stump, left alone
cutting away from Sangakkara who shoulders arms
leans across, stabs a length delivery uppishly to covers
on a length, angling outside off and Sanga goes back and across to punch it to covers
full in length on the middle and off, Sangakkara eases towards the line and caresses it straight down the track. He timed that beautifully
slanted across Sangakkara who lets it go to Rahim
tad wide outside the off stump, left alone
length delivery on the middle and off, pushed to short mid-off
leans forward to push a slower one to the off side
another slower one, pushed to left of mid-off
yet another slow off cutter and Sangakkara times it beautifully and straight but it crashes into the stumps at the other end
leans forward to push a full delivery to short extra cover
off cutter and it cuts past the outside edge. Sangakkara was looking to defend.
another off cutter, pushed to left of mid-on
carved over backward point. He went deliberately up and over the fielder there.
moving through the channel outside off, left alone
gets behind the line of short-of-length delivery and works it to midwicket
just outside the off stump, dabbed to backward point

fullish, outside off stump, Sangakkara who has been concentrating on timing his strokes so far, went hard at the off drive this time, the bat face shut and the ball rolled down the track, to right of mid-on

Birthday gift. Short. Jayasuriya unfurls the pull shot. The white ball sails over midwicket boundary. Actually, Sanath didn't quite middle it. Wonder where it would have gone had he done so. What a batsman.
pushes a length delivery to short extra cover
classy shot. It was a touch short in length, the off cutter and Sanga waited for it and cut it to left of backward point on a bent knee. Looked good.
full pitched one outside off and Sanga creams it to cover boundary
on the middle and off stump line, pushed to covers
short in length, around off stump, defended to short extra cover. There is a short mid-off too in place.
short in length, moving towards off, Sangakkara goes back to defend to the on side of the pitch
Yet another short delivery, this time on the leg stump line and Sanath short-arm pulls it over deep square leg boundary.
leans forward to defend a full delivery to covers
on the off stump line, gets forward to defend to the off side
on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket
lands on a length, outside leg, moves in towards middle and leg, flicked to long leg
full pitched around off, driven to short mid-off
steps down the track and smashes a short of length delivery through extra cover
off cutter that moves towards off stump, Sanath stays back to defend to the off side
skips down the track, moves outside leg to create room and blasts a short-of-length delivery outside off over extra cover.
fuller, on the middle and leg, Sanath was again trying to make room and force it through extra cover but sees the length and pushes it to the off side.
comes down the track again, Mortaza follows him and Sanath mistimes a pull to the leg side
pushes the last ball of the over towards mid-off for a single.
And Jayasuriya swings it the on side. What do you do? Shahadat bowled it outside off which was good but he hurled it short and Jayasuriya cashed in
threatens to jump out before staying at his original stance and swings a slower one on the off stump line over square leg
charges down the track, moves outside leg and tries to loft over the off side field and it flies off the outer edge to third man
hands the strike back right over with a push to mid-on
on a length, around off, defended to covers
He has decided to celebrate his birthday in style. Moves outside leg even as he goes down the track and drills a fullish delivery through wide mid-off region.
Sangakkara does his job. Another single, a push to mid-off region and he can stand and admire Jayasuriya's fury now.
This is murder and the security guards sitting in the stands are just mute witness to the carnage. Full delivery on the legs, a mere flick and the ball sails over midwicket
on the middle stump line, Sanath stays beside the line to push it to point
six over backward point and he has reached his fifty. What  a champion. He moved down the track, made room and carved a short-of-length delivery over the off side field.

he is making things look ridiculously easy. Another jump down the track, again outside leg to create room and carves another short of length delivery over extra cover. Last ball coming up. Bet you, it will be a single
And it is, a tickle to long leg
floated on leg and middle, turned to deep midwicket for a single. Oh its a no ball. Free hit coming up. What has he done.
fires in a yorker and Sangakkara tried to swing it to the leg side and got a bottom edge. But hold on it's another no ball. Ah
fires in another yorker and Sangakkara stabs it to midwicket
slower , on a length, outside off, driven to mid-off. Long on is in place for Sanga
tries to push it to long-on for a single but the bowler intervenes
Neat shot. He went across and swept a full delivery turning into him to deep backward square leg
turns in towards middle and off, punched to long-on for a single.
flatter, outside off stump, defended to covers
length delivery on the leg and middle, Sangakkara checks his drive to left of mid-on for a single.
goes for the yorker but it falls short of the blockhole, Jayasuriya drove it hard past the diving mid-on fielder who got a hand to it but couldn't cut it off. 100 up.
full toss outside off stump, Jayasuriya wanted to carve it over point but edged it through the vacant slip region
yorker length and well outside off, left alone and Rahim, standing up to the stumps, collects
further outside off stump, left alone and Sanath reckons it should be a wide, umpire doesn't agree and Rahim gathers it neatly
another really full delivery outside off, left alone. The three deliveries have landed just in front of Rahim who has done well to collect them
on the middle and leg, Sangakkara shuffles to off to work it to deep midwicket
turning into the pads, misses the flick and it rolls over to the leg side off the pad
not all that short but Jayasuriya goes right back and plays his short-arm pull over square leg.
thrust his front leg across to the off side and swings a full delivery to deep square leg boundary.
And so Sanath goes down town. He skips down the track and heaves it over long-on.
of all the balls to bowl, Razzak slips in a full toss well outside off and Sanath smashes to cover boundary.
punched to mid-off
full and outside off, carved away to gully, can't beat the gap, fine diving stop there
short of a length, on off, punched to cover, three dots in a row and that's something we may not remember by the end of it
driven to cover, smoothly done but no runs, he's biding his time here
full and outside off, yorker length almost, pushed to cover, jabbed that one out almost
walks down the track but Reza read that, full length, pushed back to the bowler
flicked away past short fine leg, fielder goes for the football style stop but misses
pushed to mid-on, confidently done
tossed up, defended watchfully to the off side
quicker one on middle and leg, tucked towards square leg
quicker one outside off, fetches it from outside of to mid-on
flatter, bit of turn into the left-hander, turned towards square leg
As Prakhar, a feedbacker, said now, this has been some birthday bash(ing). There he goes again. Full pitched, outside off and creamed over extra cover.
Wallop. Low full toss outside off stump, Jayasuriya pings the deep cover point boundary.
lands outside the leg stump, moves towards leg, Jayasuriya turns it to long leg for a single
leans forward to drive back to the bowler
pushed to the off side for a single
square drives a length delivery and it's fielded well at point
turns in from outside off, goes back to work it to deep midwicket.
leans forward to turn to square leg
And he reaches the hundred with a push to long leg. 55-ball ton. What a champion. Sixth fastest hundred in ODI history
pushes it to long-on for a single
dropped by Rahim. It was floated outside off, Sanath  edges a cover drive and Rahim clangs it. Razzak was jumping in anticipation and he had come back to earth in disappointment.
full delivery, driven to long-on
pushed to midwicket
goes back to turn it behind square leg
leans forward to defend
driven to extra cover
goes back to work a delivery from outside off to wide midwicket
punches to long-on
goes right back to defend to the bowler
stretches across to defend a flighted delivery outside off to covers
short in length, flatter, turning into middle and leg, worked to long leg
slower through the air, full and outside off, Sangakkara checks his drive and will pick up a single to long-on
on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
fuller, driven to long-on
leans forward to push it back to the bowler
on the pads, nudged to the on side
flighted outside off stump, pushed to covers
stays back to punch a flatter delivery to sweeper cover
comes down the track, Razzak shortens the length and defended to the on side
turns into the off stump, pushed to covers
quicker but drifting towards middle and leg, turned past square leg
driven to long-on
stays back to punch a delivery on off and middle to long-on
floated well outside off stump, swept to deep midwicket
full delivery, dug out back to the bowler
steps down the track and drives to long-on for a single
flighted outside off, driven to covers
slower, shorter, just outside off and Sanath moves back and across to tap it to left of midwicket
flighted full, slower, Sangakkara reaches out to drive to sweeper cover
short in length, quicker, cut to backward point
leans forward to drive back to the bowler
comes down, takes it on the full but drives straight to long-on.
Storm after the brief calm. Down he went on his knee and slog swept a flighted delivery from outside over midwicket
just outside off, pushed back to the bowler
punches a googly to sweeper cover
steps down the track and turns a delivery from middle and off to midwicket region
leans forward to drive back to the bowlet
reaches his fifty with a whip to right of deep midwicket fielder. Quiet and efficient. He could feature in a AC ad.
leans forward to defend
couple of steps and he lunges across to place it to extra cover
11 men don't seem enough on the field. Sanath went back to a slow delivery and deliberately hit it over extra cover
leans forward to drive to long-off, Sanath wanted to come back for the second run but Sanga was not interested
loopy delivery outside off stump, Jayasuriya went for a big lofted drive over extra cover and misses
outside off, squeezed to short third man
well outside off stump, full, driven to sweeper cover

dropped  by Kapali. Sangakkara came down the track, got too close to the ball and drove it just over head-high and Kapali couldn't hold on. They dropped a few catches against India, it has not improved today.
cut through backward point
moves outside leg and punches a googly just over the extra cover fielder
outside the off stump, misses the paddle shot and it rolls off the pads to short third man region
again he moves outside leg, the ball is full and on the off stump line and Jayasuriya hits it inside--out over extra cover.
goes back to work a delivery turning from leg and middle to backward square leg
advances down the track and lofts a flighted delivery over the bowler's head.
well outside off stump, short and flat, cut to sweeper cover.
similar delivery, Jayasuriya fails to connect with the cut and Rahim doesn't gather cleanly.
Sangakkara has decided to go for his strokes. He goes down on his knee and slog sweeps it over midwicket. Double jeopardy for Bangladesh
driven to long-off
brings the 200 with a drive to long-on
flighted full outside off stump, driven to long-off
Caught at deep cover. It was the short of length slider and Sanath carved it to the fielder. Out for a furious 130. Legend.
goes back to turn a short-of-length delivery behind square leg
on the middle and leg, wristed past the diving short fine-leg fielder. Kapali fumbles and gives away some extra runs
leans forward to flick a delivery from well outside off past square leg
goes back to tap a delivery turning into middle to midwicket
long hop and Sangakkara pulls it to left of long-on where another fumble is made
on a length, on the off stump, driven to right of bowler
goes back to punch a full delivery to covers
another long hop, pulled to wide midwicket boundary
leans forward to defend
gets forward to work a flighted delivery to midwicket
driven to sweeper cover
stretches forward to defend
edges a on drive to fine leg region
what's happening out there, Another long hop. Another pull. Another boundary
leans forward to drive to long-on
leans forward to push to the off side
guided to cover point
leans forward to dab it past square leg
goes back to work to long leg
goes right back to punch a short of length delivery to deep midwicket
goes back to punch a short of length delivery to long-on
just outside off stump, cut to point
driven to extra cover
turns in towards middle, short of length, punched to deep midwicket
keeps low after landing on a length, pushed back to the bowler
eases it to long-on for yet another single
on the leg and middle, tickled to short fine leg
leans across to work a delivery outside off to deep square leg
drags it short and Mahela rocks back to pull it to wide midwicket region
leans forward to drive to extra cover
on the stumps, dabbed down the pitch
taps to left of covers, thinks about a single but changes his mind
Caught at midwicket. Mahela pulled a short delivery low but straight to Ashraful. Not a great delivery but he picks up a wicket
worked away towards midwicket - no room for a single there
good length delivery outside the off stump, Sangakkara gets forward and taps it away towards cover
forced away wide of the fielder at cover, quick single added to the total
driven off the back-foot to deep cover for an easy single
short delivery outside the off stump, did not rise as expected. Sangakkara picked it  up early and flat batted it over the fielder at mid-on. Clean shot and the ball raced away to the fence
worked away on the off side for a qick single - excellent batting
on the middle and leg stump line, Kapugedera stays back and puches it down to mid-on. Seven from the over
drifting down the leg side, Sangakkara tries to flick it away on the leg side but fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad
better line and length - Kapugedera only manages to taps it back to the bowler

gone! line and length delivery on the stumps, Kapugedera tires to work it away on the leg side but only manages to chip it towards short midwicket. Kapali moves across quickly, drive low towards his left and takes it cleanly
good length delivery outside the off stump, defended on the front-foot
pushed towards cover for a single
again wroked away for a single
leans forward to drive to mid-off
stays back to wrist a length delivery to square leg
goes back to punch a length delivery to deep point region for a single
leans forward to dead-bat a full length delivery around the off stump
just outside the off stump, tries to run it down to third man but can't beat the backward point fielder
turns a length delivery to midwicket
full and wide, Sanga gets down on his knee to thrash it through wide mid-off region
and wide down leg side.
on a length, on the middle, defended to the on side
well down the leg side
again down leg and this time runs off the thigh pad and Rahim makes a diving half-stop and the ball rolls over towards backward square leg
full pitched outside off, driven to mid-on
punched past point for a single
he comes down the track and mistimes a heave to mid-on
arm ball on the off stump, cut to point
short in length again, turns this time, cut to right of point where a diving half-stop is made
slips down leg side and Sanga sweeps it to the fine-leg boundary
takes a step down the track and taps a flighted delivery outside off to midwicket
short and Sangakkara rocks back to pull it but hits it straight to long leg.
arm-ball on the middle, turned past square leg for a single. 11 overs to go.
back of length outside off, mistimes a cut to backward point. Three men inside the ring on the off side and just the midwicket on the leg side
fullish, just short of the yorker length, driven back to the bowler
slower one, outside off, dabbed to right of Rahim who gets some hand on it. It bounced well before him
leans forward to drive a full delivery to mid-off
just outside off stump and square driven to deep point region
trapped by the yorker. It swung in to crash into the left boot. The bat came down a second later. Plumb.
turns into Sangakkara who punches it to long-on
arm ball on the off stump line, dabbed to backward point
flighted full on the leg stump line, driven to long-off
moves to 99 with a well-placed single to wide midwicket
wristed past square leg for a single. Sangakkara on strike now
Dilshan is run out trying to get Sangakkara the hundred. Sanga looks very disappointed. It was pushed towards midwicket, Raqibul rushes forward to under arm a direct hit at the striker's end.
now he gets his ton as he drives a full toss to long-off. Vaas gets across to shake his hand. Tenth ODI ton.
drives a length delivery on the up to covers
width offered outside off, driven to sweeper cover
walks towards off stump, tries to whip a full delivery to the on side and gets a leading edge over extra cover. Ash back pedalled, jumped back but couldn't reach it
driven back to the bowler
slower one, full and outside off, Sangakkara crashes it uppishly between extra cover and mid-off
outside off, going on straight, wanted to dab it to short third man region but misses
fuller, slower, driven to long-off
skips down the track and hammers a flighted delivery over the bowler's head.
sweeps but straight to short fine leg. He then asks the umpire how many balls left in the over.
takes the single off the fifth with a punch-drive to long-on
quicker, full, on the off and middle, stabbed to on side
picks up a single of the first ball with a drive to sweeper cover.
short in length, mistimes a drive on the up to mid-off
full pitched outside off stump, driven to sweeper cover
driven through the off side
comes down the track, Reza hurls it full and outside off, Vaas reaches out and jabs it to mid-off
fullish, outside off, driven to covers
he moves back and across, opens his stance and pulls to left of deep midwicket. Razzak reckons his fielder could have got to it.
Sangakkara swings a length delivery outside off to the cow corner. SL gallop to 292
oh he has bowled him. Sangakkara went for a pull shot but played all around it.  But another ton from Mr Consistent.
outside off stump, cut uppishly towards short third man
outside off, fuller, squeezed to short third man for a quick single
flat and quick, turned to short fine-leg
full pitched outside off stump, sliced to left of sweeper cover
swing and a miss. Good old slog across the line.
low full toss outside off, carved to sweeper cover. Slight fumble there but quick recovery.
low dipping full toss, makes contact with the bottom-half of the bat and will pick up a single to long-off
slower one outside off stump, mistimes a drive back to the bowler
just short of the yorker length outside off, sliced just over extra cover
full in length, on the leg and middle, flicked to long leg
comes down the track and inside-edges a heave to fine leg boundary. It was the slower off cutter and the bowler had actually beaten the batsman with the change of pace but ...
super yorker. Tushara had moved towards off and was looking to swing it to the on side but the ball crashed into middle stump
full and outside off stump, chopped to wide third man
slower one, full, pushed to left of covers for a single
tries to whip a full delivery to the on side, gets a leading edge through mid-off down to long-off
moves down leg even as he charges down the track, the bowler hurls it outside off and he reaches out to drive to mid-off
full pitched on the middle and off, driven to long-on
Vaas walked down the track, tried to ping the cowcorner but skied the lofted shot towards long-on where Raqibul stationed himself under the ball and pouched it.
driven to midwicket region
just outside off stump, full, inside-edges a drive towards mid-on and the bowler scampers after it to make the stop.
slower one, on the middle, turned to midwicket region
dropped by Raqibul at backward point. Sitter, Sliced straight to him. He then missed a run out chance at the non-striker's ends as his throw missed the sticks
driven to long-on for a single
slower one, on the middle, is early into his whip shot across the line, gets a leading edge to the off side
yet another slower off cutter, he is made to wait and dabs it to third man
The big blow arrives. Very good hit. He rocked back to pull a length delivery over wide long-on. Very well timed.
squeezes a yorker on the off and middle to square leg
can't connect with this yorker length delivery outside off stump
driven to extra cover, the throw from Ash comes in and the bowler collects but doesn't break the stumps. Ash suggests he should have. It might have been a close thing
fullish and outside off stump, yorker length, Mendis shapes to drive and then just lets it go
Not caught in two minds this time. Down on his knee and carves a full delivery to cover boundary
outside off, slashed to third man
goes back and across to swing a full delivery on the stumps to long-on , one bounce to Shahadat who fumbles and they get the second run

inn2.comm: gets forward to defend a length delivery on the off and middle line.
on the stumps, pushed to the leg side
leans over to punch a delivery to short extra cover
cutting away from the off stump, punched to Silva at short extra cover.
fuller, further outside off and Tamim edges his square drive well to the right of backward point. For a brief while Vaasy was interested before he realised it was not going to hands
on the legs, turned to long leg. So two runs from the first over. And just a reminder again, Dilshan is keeping.
full and on the middle, worked to midwicket
short in length, homing in on the off stump, punched back to the bowler
outside off stump and left alone
crashes a full delivery outside off but it's cut off at short square point.
stretches forward to defend to the off side.
bangs it short , not much pace but Nazim mistimes the pull to square leg
charges down the track, Vass hurls it full and on the off stump line, dug out to short extra cover
leans forward to drive a length delivery shaping away from him to covers.
goes for the yorker, but slips on the legs, turned to long leg. Tamim reaches the other end and has a laugh with Vaas.
short in length, slanted across Nazim who fails to connect with his cut
just outside the off stump, defended to covers
on a length, angling away, dabbed to backward point.
nagging line and length- around the off and middle, pushed back to the bowler

Dropped by Mahela at second slip. Tough one as it was travelling very fast to his left. Tamim had flashed a length delivery off the outer edge and Mahela took off with his left hand outstretched but couldn't hold on
Here comes the charge and he finds the inside edge to fine leg boundary. He had moved outside leg and tried to force a length delivery across the line
super stop from Kapugedera at point. Tamim had hit it on the up to left of Kapu who flung himself to make the stop
yorker around the off stump, pushed back down the track
full pitched, whipped down the track
around the off stump, defended to mid-off
full and just outside off, mistimes a drive to mid-off. One wide slip in place
off cutter on the off stump line, pushed to covers
a tad short in length outside off and slashed to wide third man
And Tamim is gone. Vaas gets it to curve away off a length, Tamim tries to dab it to third man but edges it behind to Dilshan. Remember, Dilshan is the 'keeper. Sanga has not taken the field
on the middle stump, straightening, Vaas thought he had got an lbw decision but Ash quickly withdraws the front foot that was pressed across and turned the ball to square leg. Vaas holds his head.
bouncer on the middle and off, sways away
on a length, just outside off stump, inside edges a drive to pad
leans forward to defend to the off side
short-pitched delivery and Nazim pulls and pulls well. Good strike to deep backward square leg boundary
fuller, on a good length, cutting in towards off and middle, defended on the front foot
beaten by a peach of a delivery that left him late. Very late.
not that short but Ashraful goes for the pull shot, misses and is struck on the right thigh
slower one and driven uppishly and it almost carries to the short extra-cover fielder
makes sure he punches this length delivery on to the ground and it rolls away to short extra cover
fullish, outside off stump, driven to short extra cover
he walks across, tries to swing a full delivery on the leg stump, misses and it runs off the pad, past the leg stump and Dilshan couldn't get across in time
Nazim stretches across to loft a full delivery over covers. Positive intent. Can they carry on?
slower one on the off and middle line, pushed to covers.
short in length, just outside off stump, steered to backward point

run out chance missed. Almost a big mix up between the batsmen. It was dabbedclose on the leg side and they went for a run, stopping midway. There was no run in it as the bowler had cut across to make the stop, fired in a throw but missed the stumps at the striker's end. Dilshan gathers and fires in a throw at non-striker's end but Ashraful crossed over in time.
punched to the off side
almost yorker length, on the middle, pushed to mid-on
cuts in towards off stump, pushed to the off side
driven to covers
Shot boss. Full in length and outside off, Ash creamed it through cover point. The off side was packed but he found the gap brilliantly.
leans across to defend to point
serves a full and wide one, Ashraful goes after it and edges it through the vacant slip region

Another run out chance missed. It was smashed to right of point where Kapugedera made a diving half-stop and it rolled towards cover where Mubarak, the sub, picked the ball and fired a throw at the non-striker's end. Had he hit Nazim would have been gone
Super shot from the captain. He pierces that off side field again with a fluent square drive. Ash is up and running.
the left-arm seamer lands it full and on the leg and middle line, flicked in the air to right of long leg where Vaas fumbles
closer to the stumps and hurls a delivery on a length and coming in , squeezed to square leg
Bangladesh have upped the ante. Full, coming, he arrested the front leg movement and on drove it superbly through wide mid-on
short in length, moving away, punched to point
short in length, skids over middle stump, Nazim shapes to pull, misses and it brushed the thigh on to Dilshan, who appeals for a catch. No bat.

Another shout for a catch behind. Quite similar to the previous delivery. Another pull that doesn't meet the ball. Thushara has the ability to skid the ball off the turf and it can come quicker than what the batsman expects. Dilshan caught it and threw the ball up in the air and while he was appealing, the ball came down and landed on his head and rolled away! And the batsmen run for the leg byes! Waqar Younis reckons it came of the bottom edge.
leans forward to drive to covers
steps forward to heave a full delivery over mid-on. Cleanly struck.
turned to fine leg for a single
leans forward to drive to mid-off
short in length, outside off stump, cut hard but the point fielder lunges to his right to make the stop
short in length, skids across Nazim who again goes for the pull and edges it to fine leg boundary. He is going for the pull but not connecting well.
short in length, coming in towards the leg stump line, no pull from Nazim who tries to work it to the on side and is struck high on the pad.
on the off and middle line, skids on , pushes at it and edges it on to his pad
on the pads, tucked to long leg for a single

Another pull that goes awry. Tushara picks up a wicket with a short-of-length delivery that skids on to the batsman quicker than he anticipates. Nazim had survived a few times but Ash's pull went straight up and Dilshan got under it.
bangs it short of length again but slips this one down leg and Dilshan, the acting 'keeper, dives but doesn't collect cleanly. Mahela has a laugh!
leans forward to punch a length delivery to the off side
length delivery outside off, pushed to covers.
cuts in towards middle stump, defended to the on side
beaten outside off. This one cut away and it elicits oohs and aahs from the excited Dilshan
on the off stump line, run down to wide third man and they rush across to come back for the second run. Vaas was a touch late in reaching the ball; he didn't quite expect the batsmen to run two
bouncer, head high and Raqibul does well to pull it to deep backward square leg boundary. It was a well directed bouncer but Raqibul pulled off the shot
a rare misfield by Sri Lanka. Fullish and driven hard to mid-off where the fielder lets it slip through his fingers. Sorry didn't quite notice who it was.
mistimes a drive to mid-off
beaten by a lifting delivery outside off. It took off from a length and the batsman was taken completely by surprise
shorter in length, angling away, cut to Murali at third man
on the off stump line, pushed to extra cover
hammers a full pitched delivery through extra cover. Superbly struck boundary. The head was still and the left elbow high and he stood there and watched the ball race away.
leans forward to defend to the off side
welcomed to the attack with a feisty cut. It was short in length and outside off.
Wallop. He went down on his knee and whipped a full delivery over deep square leg. Nazim, much criticized in the recent times, is turning it on today
leans forward to defend a full delivery back to the bowler
lands on a length, outside off, skids on straight, pushed to off side
on middle and leg, turned to long leg
another one that skids on off a length outside off, pushed to the off side
short in length outside off stump, blasted to right of wide third man where Murali doesn't stop it cleanly and it rolls over to the boundary. That was travelling at some pace
just outside off stump, punched to the off side
from round the stumps, fullish, driven to covers
banged in short, from outside off stump, pulled down to fine leg. Free hit coming up.
banged in short, Nazim goes for the pull but couldn't connect
fuller , on middle, and it's whipped towards deep square leg. Bottom-hand working over time there.
Raqibul joins in the fun. Short and wide ,cracked over point

Dilshan , the stand in 'keeper, has messed up a run out chance. He broke the stumps with his gloves before the ball came in. Raqibul would have been gone. It was pushed to left of covers and the throw came in to Dilshan who disturbed the bails in the effort to collect the ball.
slow loopy delivery outside off, driven to the on side
on the middle and leg, worked to long leg

Nazimuddin is run out now. He just kept running despite Raqibul shouting NO No. It was turned to square leg, Raqibul had taken a step or two but shouted out to his partner to go back but Nazim couldn't stop his charge.
beaten outside off by the one that cut away
slanted across the off stump, left alone
gets behind the line of length delivery to defend down the track
almost played on. He opened the bat face and tried to chop a delivery angled across him to third man and got the inside edge
short in length, on the off stump, defended down the wicket
gets off the mark with a lovely off drive. He moved into the line of a length delivery outside off stump and caressed it through wide mid-off region.
short in length and pulled through midwicket. He made contact with the top half of the bat
leans forward to push to cover point
on the middle stump line, cuts away, runs off the outer edge to third man
comes down the track and gets a loopy delivery on his pad
leans across to work a full delivery through midwicket
slower, fuller, outside off, squeezed through cover point
spins in from outside off, pushed down the track
the doosra, outsisde off, driven to cover point and they will pick up a run from the overthrow
goes back to defend to the off side
short in length, turning in, goes back to punch to covers
turning in to the pads, misses the glance and it bounds off the pad
spins down leg side and Dilshan couldn't collect cleanly
stretches across to turn a full delivery outside off to square leg
short of a length, on off, defended back to the bowler
shortish, given width, Raqibul cuts it, good placement but Mendis cuts it off at the boundary
rose unexpectedly, defended off the back foot to covers
another dot ball, stroked towards mid-off
good tight line, defended down the pitch
on a length, Raqibul launches into a flamboyant drive, but doesn't beat the cover fielder
turn for Murali, but the shortish ball drifts towards leg, Mushfiqur tucks it behind square
doosra, not picked and it balloons off the leading edge but lands safely beyond the bowler
flighted, defended confidently
got him this time, doosra again, bounced and there was a bit of width, Mushfiqur tries a cute dab which goes straight to Jayawardene at slip
fuller outside off, comes forward and pushes it to cover
on a length put strays on to his pads, pushed towards midwicket
fuller on the legs another easy single to midwicket
better line, outside off cuts but can't beat fielder at point
angling in, driven to long-off for a single
again on the pads, easily pushed away to midwicket for a single
another one on leg stump, single this time to short fine leg
flighted, straighter one on a length, defended watchfully
beaten this time by the doosra which raps his pads but was a touch high
shorter ball, clipped to midwicket
sharp spin, but goes down the leg side
straighter one, defended cautiously
goes for the sweep this time and gets a single
another flighted delivery, on the off, driven to long-on
on a length, driven to long-on for a single
slower delivery, back of a length on middle and leg, played to midwicket
pushed up on the middle and leg, driven to long on for a single
length ball, but a bit of width, jabs it square but doesn't beat point
Bangladesh need more of those. overpitched and driven through extra cover for four
almost caught by Mendis at deep square leg. Slog swept high in the air and Mendis rushes forward and dived but couldn't get under it properly. Very good effort
turns in towards middle, defended off the back foot
fuller , on the middle, pushed to the on side
done in by the doosra. It landed on the middle and straightened, Kapali missed the sweep and was caught in front of the stumps.
turns in from outside off, pushed through cover point
on the middle and leg, on a length, worked past square leg
full and outside off stump, driven crisply to right of sweeper cover
on the middle, nudged to the on side
short in length, slower, he waited for it to guide it to right of wide third man where Vaas makes a complete mess of it.
length delivery outside off, dabbed straight to Vaas
full and well outside the off stump, left alone
turns in to off and middle, nudged to the on side
beaten by the doosra that broke away after landing just outside off stump, He didn't pick that one
another loopy doosra, edged past the slip.
turns in towards off and middle, full, defended to the off side

almost trapped by the doosra. Completely mesmerized. It landed on the leg stump line and straightened, the batsman had let it go thinking it would spin down leg but it came back and hit him high on the pad
another doosra, tentative poke and it runs off the outer edge to the off side
on the middle and leg, tucked to long leg
seam-up delivery outside off stump, punched through covers
just outside off, dabbed to short third man
on the middle and leg, off the length, worked behind square leg
leg cutter around off stump, squeezed to left of short third man
overpitched outside off, driven straight to mid-off
spins in sharply to beat the prod and hits the pad outside off
turns in, keeps low, pushed out to cover point
stretches across to defend and is struck on the pad
quicker, fuller, tapped through cover point
on the middle stump line, nudged to on side
slower, bit more air, turns in, dabbed to the on side
cuts in towards middle, turned to square leg
another one that cuts in, worked to square leg
on the middle, shaping in, steered to backward point region
fuller, on the middle, squeezed to square leg
again pretty full, trying to trap him lbw, worked through midwicket
loopy delivery on middle and leg, off the inner edge to the leg side
streches across to paddle from well outside off to fine-leg boundary. 50 for Raqibul. Well played. Fighting away alone there.
The doosra does the trick again. It landed just outside off, sucked Raqibul forward and he pushed inside the line and nicked it to Mahela at first slip
flighted full outside off stump, driven to sweeper cover
turns in, dabbed down the track
loopy delivery turning in on middle stump line, turned to square leg
doosra and Razzak doesn't pick it, tries to jab it away but is struck on the pad. But very high
goes back to push a length delivery to cover point
fuller, driven to extra cover
beaten by the one that went away. The left-handed Razzak thought it will come in but it was the googly
flatter, quicker, nudged to the on side
turns in, pushed to midwicket
Mendis picks his first wicket. Flicked a loopy delivery on the middle and leg, Mahmudullah pushed tentatively at it and edged it to leg gully
on the off stump line, turning , steered to backward point
leans forward to defend another off break
flights a off break on the leg and middle line, worked through midwicket
just outside off stump, straightens a touch, cut through point
leans forward to let a delivery turn past him
probably thought this one would be doosra and tried to defend a delivery that landed on middle and off line but it was the conventional one and turned past the outside edge
leans forward to defend a delivery that pitched outside off
turns in to middle and leg, picked it off the pitch and turned to the on side
skids on straight, dabbed to the on side
googly, driven down to long-on
short in length, slow, goes back to defend
quicker, on the middle stump line, wristed to fine leg
lands it on the middle stump line, slight turn and Razzak went for the slog sweep and dragged it on to his stumps. The wickets are tumbling at a rapid rate here. The end is nigh.
from round the stumps, full and on the middle and leg, turned with the spin behind square leg
just outside off stump, spins in, defended to silly point. Slip and leg gully are there as well
on the middle stump line, stretches forward to defend
lands on the middle stump line, turns in, nudged off the inner edge to the on side
doosra that lands on leg and middle line, squeezed to silly point
full and on the off and middle line, going on straight, played inside the line and it runs off the outer edge to third man
the quicker one, hastened on straight and almost dragged back to the stumps
The flicker, just outside off stump , rushes through quickly and he is beaten
the googly this time - oh what variations - played to the on side
spins in and defended on the front foot
leg cutter around off stump, pushes at it and edged past the diving Mahela at slip
lands on the off stump and it's the doosra, left alone. A touch too short
turns in slowly after landing on the off stump, defended to silly point
huge shout for lbw as a doosra completely beats the batsman.  He was completely opened up and was struck in front of the off stump. That would have hit the middle.
loopy delivery on the leg and middle, doesn't connect with the sweep and jabs it to on side
flatter, quicker off break, defended to silly point

Murali bags the five-for. Mortaza top edged  a sweep to Silva at short fine leg.Murali waits for the catch to be taken, claps in delight and turns back to take the cap from Taufel who breaks into a smile himself. Completely mesmerizing stuff from the magician.
leans forward to squeeze a delivery cutting into him past slip
breaks back in from middle stump and jabbed to the on side

All over. Charges down the track, has a heave and edges it to Mahela at first slip. Emphatic win for Sri Lanka. Murali and Mendis. What a potent combo. The latter half of Bangladesh couldn't handle the spicy combination. Double Jeopardy.
